dataset_name: Livability Index Analysis of Different Cities
description: This dataset provides a comprehensive analysis of the livability index for various cities around the world. It includes several factors such as housing, cost of living, startups, venture capital, travel connectivity, commute, business freedom, safety, healthcare, education, environmental quality, economy, taxation, internet access, leisure & culture, tolerance, and outdoors.

data_columns.name: UA_Country
data_columns.description: Country where the urban area is located.

data_columns.name: UA_Continent
data_columns.description: Continent where the urban area is located.

data_columns.name: Cost of Living
data_columns.description: Livability index score for cost of living.

data_columns.name: Venture Capital
data_columns.description: Livability index score for venture capital.

data_columns.name: Travel Connectivity
data_columns.description: Livability index score for travel connectivity.

data_columns.name: Business Freedom
data_columns.description: Livability index score for business freedom.

data_columns.name: Environmental Quality
data_columns.description: Livability index score for environmental quality.

data_columns.name: Internet Access
data_columns.description: Livability index score for internet access.

data_columns.name: Leisure & Culture
data_columns.description: Livability index score for leisure & culture.

source: CSV files containing livability index data for various cities.
size: Variable (depends on the number of cities and factors included)
accessibility: The data will be made freely available to the public.
reuse_conditions: The data can be reused and redistributed with proper attribution.
provenance: The data has been collected and curated for the purpose of livability index analysis.
data_quality_assurance: Quality assurance processes have been implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.
